activities: FoodMatch, Inc. (the “Company”), through its website, may collect personal information when provided to the Company, through using its website to sign up for information, newsletters or otherwise, as well as through a user’s submission of comments or questions to the Company, via the website, so as to identify the user.  The Company may collect, through its website, information in connection therewith such as a user’s name and e-mail address, and other relevant information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: The Company may process personal data in manual, automated, online, offline, electronic and hard copy form.
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program)
